summary: Better shrines! this makes the various shrines give longuer buff from wich increase from 8 hours to 32 and make prayer somewhat usefull for once.
descriptionHtml:
So i was disgusted by the duration of the shrines buff wich wouldnt even last enought for me to take use of them so i did the duration x4 wich makes it last for 32 hours instead of 8.

to do when CK is out

Also increase the exp from sleeping in a bed so to make it worthwhile 

rested- 10%
well rested- 20%
Rested with your lover- 30%
author: coolster
